abstract: This study was funded by national funding from the Foundation for Science and Technology  FCT (Portuguese Ministry of Science, Technology and Higher Education), the Operational Programmes Competitiveness and Internationalization (COMPETE 2020) and Human Capital (POCH), Portugal 2020, under the Unidade de Investigação em Epidemiologia - Instituto de Saúde Pública da Universidade do Porto (EPIUnit) (POCI-01-0145-FEDER-006862; UID/DTP/04750/2019) and the PhD grant SFRH/BD/111794/2015 (CR).
affiliations: Investigação em Epidemiologia - Instituto de Saúde Pública da Universidade do Porto (EPIUnit) (POCI-01-0145-FEDER-006862; UID/DTP/04750/2019) and the PhD grant SFRH/BD/111794/2015 (CR)
author: Ines Baia; Rosa Domingues; Carina Rodrigues; Henrique Barros
title: Pregnancy and breastfeeding during COVID-19 pandemic: A systematic review of published pregnancy cases

award-group.funding-source: Instituto de Saúde Pública da Universidade do Porto

funding.funding-statement: This study was funded by national funding from the Foundation for Science and Technology  FCT (Portuguese Ministry of Science, Technology and Higher Education), the Operational Programmes Competitiveness and Internationalization (COMPETE 2020) and Human Capital (POCH), Portugal 2020, under the Unidade de Investigação em Epidemiologia - Instituto de Saúde Pública da Universidade do Porto (EPIUnit) (POCI-01-0145-FEDER-006862; UID/DTP/04750/2019) and the PhD grant SFRH/BD/111794/2015 (CR)
